name: Virago: Trepidation
description:
Game Overview

Willow is a young woman who has been struggling to deal with a stalker who has been following her and causing her great fear and anxiety. One day, after a particularly harrowing encounter with the stalker, Willow begins to experience strange hallucinations. These hallucinations take the form of strange, distorted images and sounds that seem to come from nowhere, and they seem to be connected to the stalker in some way.

Game Objective

As Willow tries to navigate through her everyday life, she must also confront the reality of her hallucinations and try to understand what they mean. Along the way, she will need to use her wits and resourcefulness to evade the stalker and keep herself safe. With a mix of puzzle-solving and stealth gameplay, players must help Willow unravel the mystery of her hallucinations and find a way to escape the clutches of her stalker.

Lore

play as a Willow going through the seven stages of grief following a personal loss. Explore the protagonist's emotions as she moves through denial, anger, bargaining, depression, acceptance, and beyond. Immerse yourself in her story and use puzzle-solving mechanics to unlock memories and confront her pain. With stunning visuals and a hauntingly beautiful soundtrack, this game is a powerful journey through grief, healing, and acceptance.

Features:

  • Play as Willow on the run, exploring a mysterious world filled with danger and opportunity.
  • Navigate a variety of environments, from bustling cities to quiet forests, as you evade the mysterious forces chasing you.
  • Use stealth and quick thinking to outwit your pursuers and uncover the truth behind their relentless pursuit.
  • Unravel a gripping story through interactions with characters and uncovering secrets in the world.
  • Stunning graphics and an immersive soundtrack that will keep you on the edge of your seat as you race to survive.
